alert.note: Alert for Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 07 at 7:09PM MST until November 08 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow. Moderate to heavy snow at times. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches, locally higher amounts at the peaks. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph on the peaks. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains West and Wind River Mountains East. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. South Pass will see some snow at times and windy conditions, but snowfall amounts will only be 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
